basics.name: Raffaele Trivillin
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Full-stack software developer with 5-6 years of experience, currently completing a `Cloud Developer` course through ITS Alto Adriatico. I have built multiple web applications across different domains and tech stacks. I am eager to contribute to and learn from a company working on large-scale enterprise applications. I define myself as a calm and curious person committed to always deliver the best quality results, whether independently or in a team.

certificates.name: Protezione Dati Personali: GDPR, Privacy e Sicurezza
certificates.issuer: AICA - Associazione Italiana per l'Informatica e il Calcolo Automatico

work.name: Archeido S.r.l.
work.summary: Developed features, tested and refactored full stack SaaS B2B web applications
highlights: Developed and maintained backend services using Ruby on Rails and NodeJS;
Test writing using RSpec and RSwag for API documentation;
Developed and maintained frontend using React and Antd components library;
Developed features for a mobile application using React Native;
Developed and maintained a microservice for handling MQTT messages to and from and EMQX broker using NodeJS;
responsibilities: Given full ownership for the development of the 2 long-term projects I worked on.
Tasked to study and developed a cross-platform Electron application and analazying the feasibility of upgrading firmware on a famous brand of helmet intercoms.

achievements.title: Solved a core N+1 query performance issue using a tree structure for self referential table
subAchievements: Created a migration port all the existing data to the new structure

achievements.title: Implemented a new section in a company's application for handling distribution of products for remote machines
subAchievements: Developed hierarchy of customers and sub-customers for handling the distribution of products, with different features depending on the "level"
Developed a mobile version of the application dedicated to on-field operators for handling stocks loading

work.name: ISTES ICT Solutions S.r.l.
work.summary: Designed, Developed and deployed full stack SaaS B2B web applications and windows desktop applications mainly for the HoReCa domain
responsibilities: Full stack development of web applications using Angular - .NET - SQL Server Stack
Deployment of web applications on company owned servers (Windows Server 2019), Azure or on IIS on prem, depending on customer requests
Development of Windows Desktop applications and services in C#, VB .NET and VB6 (company legacy applications)
Conversion of customer requests into technical specifications and development of the requested features
Team management support for time and resources estimates for the development of projects features

achievements.title: Designed and developed from scratch a full hotel PMS application
subAchievements: Digital invoicing serialization and automated billing on Fiscal RT Printers (as per Italian Law)
Multiple reports available both in excel and pdf format
24 hours check-in service connected to a 3rd party Totem
Restaurant management and kitchen orders handling
Integration with 3rd party services (e.g. Channel Managers. Revenue Management Systems)
Integration with the State Police portal for guest data and with regional statistic data aggregators (as per Italian Law)

achievements.title: Designed and developed a restaurant POS application for order handling, table management, kitchen orders, and billing
Custom query extraction for the customer's needs using TSQL Stored Procedures/functions and reports generation
Maintained a Property Management application for a Rental Agency
Maintained a Beach Management application for renting sunbeds and umbrellas
Maintained old legacy application in VB6

projects.name: Electron Resource Monitor
projects.description: A simple Electron application that monitors the system resources and displays them in a simple UI. A project to learn Electron and how it works.

projects.name: Azure Microservices exam
projects.description: A level'd up version of the prep exam for the Azure microservice ITS course. Details are in the README of the project.
highlights: üîß EF Core, AzureSQL, Azure functions, Worker service
